result.eng: There only a couple of minutes left.
result.html: Níl ach cúpla nóiméad fágthaThere only a couple of minutes left.
result.ponchtml: Níl aċ cúpla nóiméad fágṫaThere only a couple of minutes left.

result.eng: There's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.
result.ga: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é

result.ponchtml: Tá ollṁargaḋ agus cúpla monarċa in Indreaḃán aċ ní baile fós éThere's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.orig: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.html: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do ṁac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: I live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.
result.ga: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóthar
result.orig: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóthar
result.html: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bótharI live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.
result.ponchtml: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóṫarI live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.orig: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.html: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé le cúpla seanċara as Baile na hAḃann nuair a ḃí mé ṫallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.

result.eng: There are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ga: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.html: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaineThere are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ponchtml: Tá cúpla teaċ táḃairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin ċeoil ar siúl ag an deireaḋ seaċtaineThere are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.

result.eng: His wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.
result.ga: Tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla mí
result.orig: Tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla mí
result.html: Tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla míHis wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḃean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla míHis wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire

result.ponchtml: Anois ba ṁaiṫ liom cúpla ceist eile a ċur ort faoi ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.

result.eng: They only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ga: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.orig: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.html: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág na coṁarsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó ẛinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: The city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ga: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
